> Learn to create value for other people, become deeply motivated in creating value in others.

> You can't solve a problem unless you can visualise it through others eyes

> It's addictive to make others happy. You can only go so far on motivation to 'be better than other people' - you'll never be satisfied

> Constantly try to think "is there another way to do this?" - Destroy your ideas, shoot it down. 99% of your ideas are fundamentally flawed. - **Is there another way to do this?**
